generated_body: If you click on "The Real Reason McDonald's Keeps the Filet-O-Fish on Their Menu," you may expect to read about the strategic and marketing decisions behind McDonald's enduring choice to offer the Filet-O-Fish sandwich. Additionally, it may delve into historical sales data and marketing campaigns that have helped maintain the sandwich's relevance over the years.
